name: Conquest Of America
description:
This game is an authentic historical depiction of the conquest of America.

It was made for the TriJam #50.

All characters are fictitious, and any ressemblence to a real-life person is hilariously not our fault.

Code and art was written / drawn in 3h, accordingly to the jam rules.

Music was self-made, earlier for other projects.

Proudly made by Maxime Cornet (tenroc) and Vincent Thiébaud (xily).
